revised_title: Observations on Asiatic Elephant Species and Dentition
tldr: The author, John Corse, provides detailed observations on the different species of Asiatic elephants and their dentition. He describes the physical characteristics, behavior, and breeding patterns of the koomareah, merghee, and sunkareah breeds. The author also discusses the use of elephant tusks for ivory and their role in the ivory trade, as well as the differences between African and Asiatic elephants.
